mapper.select: SELECT er.id, er.exercise_id, e.name AS exercise_name, e.met, e.intensity_level, e.type, er.recorded_at, er.duration_minutes, er.calories FROM exercise_records er JOIN exercises e ON er.exercise_id = e.id WHERE er.id = #{recordId} AND er.email = #{email}

SELECT er.id, er.exercise_id, e.name AS exercise_name, e.met, e.intensity_level, e.type, er.recorded_at, er.duration_minutes, er.calories FROM exercise_records er JOIN exercises e ON er.exercise_id = e.id WHERE er.email = #{email} AND er.recorded_at >= CONCAT(#{recordedAt}, ' 00:00:00') AND er.recorded_at < DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{recordedAt}, ' 00:00:00'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY er.recorded_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise_records (email, exercise_id, recorded_at, duration_minutes, calories) VALUES (#{email}, #{exerciseId}, #{recordedAt}, #{durationMinutes}, #{calories})
